hero.title: We’re here if plans change
hero.subtitle: Start with our quick FAQ, then reach out using chat or email if you still need a human to look into a booking.

cancellations.q: How do cancellations and changes work?
cancellations.a: Each booking clearly shows if it is flexible or non‑refundable. Flexible stays usually allow changes up to a certain time before check‑in.

bookings.q: Where can I see my bookings?
bookings.a: Open your Profile and go to the My Bookings section. From there you can review details and, where supported, request cancellation.

currency.a: Prices are shown in Jordanian Dinar (JOD) for now. Your bank or card provider may convert from your home currency.

problem.q: Something is wrong with my stay—what should I do?
problem.a: First, speak to the property directly so they can resolve it quickly. If you still need help, contact VisitJo support with your booking ID.

chat.title: Chat with an assistant
chat.body: Use the blue chat bubble in the bottom‑right corner to start a conversation with the VisitJo travel assistant. Ask about bookings, destinations, or how policies work.
chat.note: In a production setup, this can be connected to a live‑agent system so that complex issues are handed over to a human.

email.title: Email support
email.body: For issues that are not urgent, send us an email including your booking ID, dates, and a short description of the problem.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: Here’s how we collect, use, and protect your information.

1.title: Information we collect
1.body: We collect information you provide (like name and email) and basic usage data to improve the service.

2.title: How we use information
items: To create and manage your account
To process bookings and provide support

3.title: Sharing
3.body: We only share data with service providers needed to run the app (payments, email, analytics), or when required by law.

4.title: Cookies
4.body: We use cookies and similar technologies for essential functionality and to understand usage patterns.

5.title: Contact
5.body: If you have questions about privacy, contact us via the Support page.

terms.title: Terms & Conditions
terms.intro: By using VisitJo you agree to the following terms.

1.title: Using the service
1.body: Use the website responsibly and provide accurate information when creating an account or booking.

2.title: Bookings
items: Policies vary by property and rate
You are responsible for reviewing booking details
VisitJo may run in demo/test mode where reservations are not confirmed with hotels

3.title: Payments
3.body: Payments are processed securely by third‑party providers.

4.title: Cancellations
4.body: Cancellation rules depend on the property and rate type shown during checkout.

5.title: Limitation of liability
5.body: VisitJo is provided as‑is; we’re not liable for indirect damages related to use of the service.

6.title: Changes
6.body: We may update these terms from time to time. Continued use means you accept the updated terms.

7.title: Demo / testing
7.body: When VisitJo is running in demo or test mode, bookings may be simulated and are not confirmed with hotels. If a payment flow is enabled for testing, charges use test providers and no real money should be transferred.

8.title: Third‑party content & trademarks
8.body: Hotel names, trademarks, and other brand identifiers belong to their respective owners. Prices, availability, and descriptions may be provided by third‑party sources and can change; VisitJo is not affiliated with or endorsed by the listed hotels unless explicitly stated.
